title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.9 - Living rooms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.9 - Living rooms

State Regulations
(a) Cottage type institutions. Cottage type institutions shall provide an adequate
living room in each cottage for the free and informal use of the children
living therein. (b) Congregate type of institutions. Congregate type of institutions shall provide adequate
living rooms for the free and informal use of the children under
care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
442.9

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
